titles.title: Local Task Forces on 21st Century Policing Act of 2018
To authorize grantees of Department of Justice grants to set up task forces on policing in local communities, and for other purposes.
Local Task Forces on 21st Century Policing Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

bill.summary: Local Task Forces on 21st Century Policing Act of 2018 This bill amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to allow a state or local government to use Edward Byrne Memorial Justice Assistance Grant Program funds to establish a task force to identify the best ways to create an effective partnership between law enforcement officers and the communities they serve.
